name: Diamond Miner Microgame
description:
You have 10 seconds to get rich.

This isn't really a serious submission to the Minecraft jam lol

I wanted to do the jam but forgot, so last-minute I decided to make a tiny Minecraft microgame for a Warioware-type project we're making for fun. The overlay and transitions and such is part of our "Loungeware" framework—only the microgame within the console screen was made for this jam,

CONTROLS: Arrow keys to move, Z to jump, X to mine.

Made with GMS2 in a handful of hours.
